casebody.data:
KERR-McGEE OIL INDUSTRIES, Inc. v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE. No. 4355. United States Court of.Appeals Tenth Circuit. March 29, 1952. C. D. Ellison, Oklahoma City, Okl., for petitioner. Theron Lamar Caudle, Asst. Atty. Gen., Ellis N. Slack, Sp. Asst, to' Atty. Gen., Department of Justice, and Charles Oliphant, Chief Counsel, and Rollin H. Transue, Sp. Atty., Bureau of Internal Revenue, Washington, D. C., for respondent

*220Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and MURRAH and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed per stipulation on authority of, M-B-K Drilling Company, Inc., etc., v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue, 10 Cir., 1952, 194 F.2d 221.
